title: account got put on low priority queue for internet issues
body: i have never left a game ever an my account was put on low queue because it said i left but what actually happened was i waiting for my game to load an it was taking forever to load an when it finally loaded it said i was a leaver an put me on low queue an an made me ineligible to earn loot which is infuriating me because all i was doing was waiting for my game to load how do i get this removed because i didnt do anything wrong sometimes my games load fast an sometimes they dont. i dont deserve to be put on this low priority queue. I would like to know how can i get this removed because i want to play i had to make another account because the same thing happened to my last account but it wouldnt let me earn loot.

replies.body: can u get perma banned from loot if the game keeps loading slow an it says your afk?

A *low-priority queue* cannot affect your loot eligibility as a whole. If you go AFK or leave a match, you *will* be ineligible to earn loot from that **single match**.

You cannot receive an LPQ for disconnecting from a single match, and it, in fact, takes a *trend of disconnections* before you'll see a penalty like this. Regardless of intention, a disconnection negatively affects everyone in the match, which is big reason why all disconnections are treated equally and why we cannot remove penalties.

I hope this clears up your confusion around what happened. Let me know if you have any questions or any further issues.
